Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, this is iVG and I'm back in the Kerbal Universe (for those who don't know me, I've been away for a while) and this time with a bang! 

I'm happy to announce that I've recently started a brand new youtube channel so beware - there won't be 100k views just yet! I am a huge fan of the KSP and I have been following the development closely so I think this is the best time to stick around and play some KSP!

But enough of that - I need your help! Do you have troubles in KSP? Have you recently started Career and come to a grinding dead end? Would you like to see a real solar system sandbox series or you have even better idea? Let me know, use the comment section in the video if you have suggestions, I'm happy to read and interact!

That's going to be me for now and see you in the next one!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tj-hWx0gWqo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
